titleInfo.title: Sixteenth Annual Field Day of the Christian Brothers College, Memphis, Tenn.

mods.abstract: Field Days were held at the end of the spring term and featured a variety of athletic events: discus, hammer throw, shot put, hurdles, a variety of races, and more. Students competing in each event were listed in the program. The Sixteenth Field Day was held at the Tri-State Fair Grounds, now simply known as the Fair Grounds, in Memphis, Tennessee.

subject.geographic: Fair Grounds, East Parkway, Memphis, TN
